field.label: Taxation Policy
field.comment:
The policy you select determines whether the product catalog price on the storefront is INCLUSIVE or EXCLUSIVE of the taxes. Once set, you cannot change it again.
  • Gross: - Included taxes are part of the catalog price and are not added separately to the cart subtotal.
  • Net: — Included taxes are NOT part of the catalog price and are added separately to the cart subtotal.

field.label: Tax Mode
field.comment:
• Disabled — Disables AvaTax tax estimation and uses native Magento tax estimation. Use this option when you want to use address validation only.
  • Estimate Tax — Runs AvaTax tax estimation during order checkout but does NOT submit completed orders to AvaTax.
  • Estimate Tax & Submit Transactions to AvaTax — Runs AvaTax tax estimation during order checkout and submits invoices and credit memos to AvaTax.

field.label: Taxable Countries
field.comment: Select which countries to enable for tax calculation (address verification countries are configured below).

field.label: Filter Tax Calculation By Region
field.comment: Should tax calculation only apply to certain regions? Only change this to Yes if you have a specific reason to do so. See the [documentation](https://github.com/avadev/Avalara-AvaTax-for-Magento2/blob/develop/docs/sales-tax.md#filter_by_region) for more details.

field.label: Enabled Regions
field.comment: Select regions where you want AvaTax tax calculation to apply. Unselected regions will use native Magento tax calculation. If you change the selection of the Taxable Countries field, you must save this page for this region list to update.

field.label: Calculate Tax Before Discount
field.comment: Should tax be calculated on each item before discounts are applied

field.label: Commit Submitted Transactions
field.comment: Should transactions sent to AvaTax be committed? Only change to No if you have specific reason to do so.

field.label: Customer Code Format
field.comment: Select a format for identifying customers in AvaTax. Available options include any customer attributes that exist in Magento. If you don’t have a value defined for the selected attribute when the transaction is processed and sent to Avalara, your customer or guest ID is used instead. Don’t change this setting once the integration is live.

field.label: UPC Attribute To Use As Item Code
field.comment: By default, this extension sends the Magento product SKU to the AvaTax ItemCode field. However if you want to use a UPC product attribute as the AvaTax ItemCode, select which attribute above maps to your UPC attribute. If a UPC attribute is present on a product, it will be used as the AvaTax ItemCode and will be prepended with "UPC: ". Otherwise the product's SKU will be sent. Sending the UPC in the ItemCode field will allow you to bypass the Avalara Tax Code selection and mapping in your product record. The UPC, when sent in the ItemCode field, maps directly to the Avalara Product Tax Code so you don’t have to map those codes separately.

field.label: Ref1 Attribute
field.comment: AvaTax allows you to pass arbitrary information into two reference fields for each line item. Select a text type product attribute to be sent to AvaTax in the Ref1 field. Only the first 250 characters of this attribute will be sent to AvaTax.

field.label: Ref2 Attribute
field.comment: AvaTax allows you to pass arbitrary information into two reference fields for each line item. Select a text type product attribute to be sent to AvaTax in the Ref2 field. Only the first 250 characters of this attribute will be sent to AvaTax.

field.label: Location Code
field.comment: Unless outlet-based reporting is needed. Location code is a value assigned by some State jurisdictions that identifies a particular store location. These States may require tax liabilities to be broken out separately for each store Location. Read more in the AvaTax documentation.

field.label: Shipping Tax Code
field.comment: The Avalara tax code used to classify the shipping service type.

field.label: Shipping SKU
field.comment: The SKU sent to denote shipping costs.

field.label: Adjustment Refund SKU
field.comment: The SKU sent to denote positive adjustments on Credit Memos.

field.label: Adjustment Fee SKU
field.comment: The SKU sent to denote negative adjustments on Credit Memos.

field.label: Gift Wrap Order SKU
field.comment: The SKU sent AvaTax to denote gift wrap order costs. Only relevant for Magento Enterprise.

field.label: Gift Wrap Items SKU
field.comment: The SKU sent AvaTax to denote gift wrap item costs. Only relevant for Magento Enterprise.

field.label: Gift Wrap Printed Card SKU
field.comment: The SKU sent to denote gift wrap printed card costs. Only relevant for Magento Enterprise.
